poem:
Affordable Hope

Bricks stacked  
like intentions—  
a £2bn promise  
constructs possibility  
amidst fallen profits.

Vistry,  
a name unwritten  
in the blueprints of hope,  
suspended  
futures—

homes, not dividends,  
in the empty pockets  
of a city  
waiting  
to feel warmth  
between walls.
